messages.message:
Currently all PRs are failing the danger build due to the step to setup ruby. It seems like the github action is deprecated. I think the fix is to update this line (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/8605ffe87b4414f172a584f1e3de6aeff0907b73/.github/workflows/danger.yml#L16) but I'm not sure if there's an approval process for this to make sure that the new setup-ruby library is ok to use. Does anyone know what the next steps here could be? Maybe @shiqi?

Failing build:
Please ignore it for now, we will look into fixing it. If you already have the fix, we can help review it and get it merged, thanks!
i dont have a fix, thanks for following up!
